General.Name: Shandong Jinjing Science and Technology Stock Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Jinjing Science & Technology Stock Co.,Ltd produces and sells glass products. The company offers ultra white glass, off-line coated glass, online coated glass, sun film glass, color glass, fire glass, automotive glass, low salt and heavy glass soda, light soda, baking soda and baking soda detergent, etc. It serves to construction, automotive, solar, industrial products, and other market segments. The company export its products to Europe, the United States, Japan, South Korea, Southeast Asia, Australia, the Middle East, and internationally. Shandong Jinjing Science & Technology Stock Co.,Ltd was founded in 1999 and is based in Zibo, China.
General.Address: High-new Technology Development Zone, Zibo, China, 255086
